original_text: People cannot get what God promised because they obey rules. If they could get it like that, then faith in God would be worth nothing. And what God promised would be worth nothing. People cannot get what God promised because they obey rules. If they could get it like that, then faith in God would be worth nothing. And what God promised would be worth nothing.
korean_text: 만일 율법에 속한 자들이 상속자이면 믿음은 헛것이 되고 약속은 파기되었느니라

sentences.original_text: People cannot get what God promised
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 하나님이 약속한 것을 얻을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: If they could get it like that
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그런 방식으로 얻을 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: then faith in God would be worth nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님에 대한 믿음은 아무 가치가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And what God promised would be worth nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님이 약속한 것도 아무 가치가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: People cannot get what God promised
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 하나님이 약속한 것을 얻을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: If they could get it like that
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그런 방식으로 얻을 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: then faith in God would be worth nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님에 대한 믿음은 아무 가치가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And what God promised would be worth nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님이 약속한 것도 아무 가치가 없을 것입니다
